item.title: Networking
item.description: Â This is the process of designing, implementing, upgrading and managing networks and network technologies There are significant amount of [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_networks/networking_benefits|benefits]] and [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_networks/cost_of_networking|costs]] to networking

item.title: Networking Benifits
item.description: Information Sharing Authorized user can use other computers on the network to access and share information
